title: Cher Net Worth 2025: How Much Money Does She Make?
description: Cher’s net worth in 2025 fascinates fans, as the iconic performer built her fortune through decades of success in music, film, and business. Dubbed the “Goddess of Pop,” she thrives by constantly reinventing herself. Let’s explore Cher’s income sources and how she remains one of the world’s most influential entertainers. What is Cher’s net worth […] The post Cher Net Worth 2025: How Much Money Does She Make? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Vritti Johar
excerpt: Discover Cher's net worth in 2025 and explore how the iconic performer has built her fortune through her diverse professional ventures
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Cher’s net worth in 2025 fascinates fans, as the iconic performer built her fortune through decades of success in music, film, and business. Dubbed the “Goddess of Pop,” she thrives by constantly reinventing herself. Let’s explore Cher’s income sources and how she remains one of the world’s most influential entertainers. What is Cher’s net worth in 2025? Cher has an estimated net worth of $360 million in 2025. Cher’s wealth comes from her legendary career as a singer, actress, and producer. She also earns through her memoir deal, Las Vegas residencies, brand endorsements, and a new biopic project. Cher is best known as the “Goddess of Pop,” with a career spanning over six decades. She is famous for hits like “Believe” and “If I Could Turn Back Time,” as well as her Oscar-winning role in Moonstruck and her iconic stage presence. What does Cher do for a living? Cher is a singer, actress, producer, and entrepreneur. Cher’s achievements include selling millions of her music records worldwide, starring in hit films, and launching successful ventures in books, film production, and business. Most recently, Cher released Part One of her memoir in late 2024, launched her own gelato brand, and co-produced an upcoming biopic about her life at Universal Pictures. Cher’s earnings explained — how does she make money? Cher earns money through a variety of professional pursuits: Music: With 27 studio albums and several soundtrack appearances, Cher has sold millions of records. Acting: Cher has starred in films like Moonstruck (earning her an Oscar), Burlesque, and Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again. Las Vegas Residency: Cher earned up to $60 million annually from her Las Vegas residencies. Producing: Cher is also the co-producer of her biopic and previously produced Broadway’s The Cher Show. Books: Cher’s memoir deal with HarperCollins reportedly earned her a hefty advance. Cher’s 2025 projects include Part Two of her memoir, a biopic at Universal Pictures, and new music with potential live performances. In recent interviews, she hinted at more to come. With over six decades of success, Cher remains a global entertainment icon showing no signs of slowing down.
html:
Cher’s net worth in 2025 fascinates fans, as the iconic performer built her fortune through decades of success in music, film, and business. Dubbed the “Goddess of Pop,” she thrives by constantly reinventing herself.

Let’s explore Cher’s income sources and how she remains one of the world’s most influential entertainers.

What is Cher’s net worth in 2025?

Cher has an estimated net worth of $360 million in 2025.

Cher’s wealth comes from her legendary career as a singer, actress, and producer. She also earns through her memoir deal, Las Vegas residencies, brand endorsements, and a new biopic project.

Cher is best known as the “Goddess of Pop,” with a career spanning over six decades. She is famous for hits like “Believe” and “If I Could Turn Back Time,” as well as her Oscar-winning role in Moonstruck and her iconic stage presence.

What does Cher do for a living?

Cher is a singer, actress, producer, and entrepreneur.

Cher’s achievements include selling millions of her music records worldwide, starring in hit films, and launching successful ventures in books, film production, and business.

Most recently, Cher released Part One of her memoir in late 2024, launched her own gelato brand, and co-produced an upcoming biopic about her life at Universal Pictures.

Cher’s earnings explained — how does she make money?

Cher earns money through a variety of professional pursuits:

  1. Music: With 27 studio albums and several soundtrack appearances, Cher has sold millions of records.
  2. Acting: Cher has starred in films like Moonstruck (earning her an Oscar), Burlesque, and Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again.
  3. Las Vegas Residency: Cher earned up to $60 million annually from her Las Vegas residencies.
  4. Producing: Cher is also the co-producer of her biopic and previously produced Broadway’s The Cher Show.
  5. Books: Cher’s memoir deal with HarperCollins reportedly earned her a hefty advance.

Cher’s 2025 projects include Part Two of her memoir, a biopic at Universal Pictures, and new music with potential live performances. In recent interviews, she hinted at more to come. With over six decades of success, Cher remains a global entertainment icon showing no signs of slowing down.
